description:
Your choices are heavier and faster than a bullet.
Now YOU are the protagonist of your own TPSRPG. SWORD ART ONLINE: FATAL BULLET enhances third person-shooter combat with RPG levels, experience points, and story elements. Set in Gun Gale Online, a world of guns and steel, players will get to experience logging in as a new character, partnering up with a rare support AI found by chance called ArFA-sys, and walking the path of a hero. Develop your avatar double as you see fit, master a wide array of weapons and skills, and learn to survive in your personal warzone. Players can also enjoy co-op and PvP using the weapons theyâ€™ve found with their customized character.

*Only a limited portion is playable in the trial version.
*The trial version contains a level cap for created characters.
*The number of characters is limited in the trial version.
*Save data created in the trial version can be imported to the full retail game.
shortDescription:
Your choices are heavier and faster than a bullet.
Full dive into an original story where you are the protagonist in the world of Gun Gale Online. Create your own avatar and explore devastated lands with your partner AI while experiencing exciting third person shooting in this action RPG. Encounter enemies and run into new and familiar faces from the Sword Art Online series. Choose your fate.
title: SWORD ART ONLINE: FATAL BULLET
